mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SM02D01 A INNER JOIN TB_SM02M01 B ON(A.CO_CD=B.CO_CD AND A.ORDRG_NO=B.ORDRG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.ORDRG_NO , C.ORDRG_SEQ , C.SALES_CD , NVL(IN_QTY, 0) AS IN_QTY FROM TB_SM03D01 C ) C ON( A.ORDRG_NO=C.ORDRG_NO AND A.SALES_CD=C.SALES_CD AND A.ORDRG_SEQ=C.ORDRG_SEQ) WHERE 1=1

/* No. 내림차순 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.CO_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.CO_CD) AS CO_CD_NM /* 회사명 */ , B.ORDRG_NO /* 발주번호 */ , B.REQ_NO /* 요인별 요청번호 */ , A.SALES_CD , B.PCHS_CLNT_CD /* 구매처cd */ , ( SELECT D.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 D WHERE B.PCHS_CLNT_CD=D.CLNT_CD ) AS PCHS_CLNT_NM /* 구매처명 */ , TO_CHAR(B.ORDRG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDRG_DT /* 발주일자 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV10 /* 발주구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV10) AS ORDRG_DIV10_NM /* 발주구분명 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV20 /* 용도구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV20) AS ORDRG_DIV20_NM /* 용도구분명 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV30 /* 특성구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV30) AS ORDRG_DIV30_NM /* 특성구분명 */ , B.CURR_CD /* 통화단위 */ , B.EXRATE , SUM(A.ORDRG_QTY) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ) ORDRG_QTY /* 발주수량 */ , SUM(A.ORDRG_AMT) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ) ORDRG_AMT /* 발주금액 */ , TO_CHAR(B.DUDT_DEQ_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DUDT_DEQ_DT , B.CREAT_ID , B.CREAT_PGM , B.CREAT_DTTM , A.ORDRG_SEQ , B.ORDRG_DT , NVL(SUM(IN_QTY) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ), 0) IN_QTY /* 입고수량 */ , SUM(A.ORDRG_QTY) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ) - NVL(SUM(IN_QTY) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ), 0) AS REAMIN_IN_QTY /* 잔여수량 */ /*, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(C.IO_DIV) AS IO_DIV_NM */ /* 아이템 구분명 */ /*, C.IO_DIV AS IO_DIV_CD */ /* 수불구분 */ , NVL( ( SELECT DISTINCT MAX(D.FILE_TRGT_KEY) OVER() AS FILE_TRGT_KEY FROM TB_SM03M01 D INNER JOIN TB_SM03D01 CC ON(CC.IN_NO=D.IN_NO) WHERE A.ORDRG_NO=CC.ORDRG_NO ) , 0) AS FILE_TRGT_KEY , ( SELECT DISTINCT MAX(D.IN_NO) OVER() AS IN_NO FROM TB_SM03M01 D INNER JOIN TB_SM03D01 CC ON(CC.IN_NO=D.IN_NO) WHERE A.ORDRG_NO=CC.ORDRG_NO ) AS IN_NO FROM TB_SM02D01 A INNER JOIN TB_SM02M01 B ON(A.CO_CD=B.CO_CD AND A.ORDRG_NO=B.ORDRG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.ORDRG_NO , C.ORDRG_SEQ , NVL(SUM(IN_QTY), 0) AS IN_QTY FROM TB_SM03D01 C INNER JOIN TB_SM03M01 D ON(D.IN_NO=C.IN_NO) GROUP BY C.ORDRG_NO, C.ORDRG_SEQ, C.IN_NO ) C ON( A.ORDRG_NO=C.ORDRG_NO AND A.ORDRG_SEQ=C.ORDRG_SEQ) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.CO_CD DESC, A.ORDRG_NO DESC, A.ORDRG_SEQ DESC, A.CREAT_DTTM DESC, A.UDT_DTTM DESC ) X ) WHERE 1=1 AND RN BETWEEN ${firstIndex} AND ${lastIndex}

/* No. 내림차순 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.CO_CD) CO_CD_NM , A.IN_NO /* 입고번호 */ , A.IO_DIV AS IO_DIV_CD /* 수불구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.IO_DIV) AS IO_DIV_NM /* 아이템 구분명 */ , A.REQ_NO /* 요인별 요청번호 */ , A.SALES_CD , A.PCHS_CLNT_CD /* 구매처cd */ , ( SELECT D.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 D WHERE A.PCHS_CLNT_CD=D.CLNT_CD ) AS PCHS_CLNT_NM /* 구매처명 */ , C.ORDRS_CLNT_CD /* 고객사 */ , C.ORDRS_CLNT_NM /* 고객사명 */ , C.CLNT_PJT /* 고객사 PJT */ , C.PRDT_CD /* 제품구분 */ , C.PRDT_NM /* 제품구분명 */ , C.ITEM_DIV /* 아이템 구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(C.ITEM_DIV) AS ITEM_DIV_NM /* 아이템 구분명 */ , TO_CHAR(A.IN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DT /* 압고일자 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV10 /* 발주구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV10) AS ORDRG_DIV10_NM /* 발주구분명 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV20 /* 용도구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV20) AS ORDRG_DIV20_NM /* 용도구분명 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV30 /* 특성구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV30) AS ORDRG_DIV30_NM /* 특성구분명 */ , A.CURR_CD /* 통화단위 */ , A.EXRATE , IN_AMT /* 입고금액 */ , TO_CHAR(A.IN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DT /* 입고일자 */ , A.ETC_FIELD1 , A.ETC_FIELD2 , A.ETC_FIELD3 , A.CREAT_ID , A.CREAT_PGM , A.CREAT_DTTM FROM TB_SM03M01 A INNER JOIN TB_SM02M01 B ON(A.CO_CD=B.CO_CD AND A.SALES_CD=B.SALES_CD AND A.REQ_NO=B.REQ_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ , Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD /* 고객사 */ , A.CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM /* 고객사명 */ , X.SALES_CD , Y.CLNT_PJT /* 고객사PJT */ , X.PRDT_CD /* 제품구분 */ , E.PRDT_NM /* 제품구분명 */ , X.ITEM_DIV /* 아이템 구분 */ , X.EQP_NM /* 설비명 */ FROM TB_CR02D02 X /* 수주상세 */ INNER JOIN TB_CR02M01 Y ON(X.CO_CD = Y.CO_CD AND X.ORDRS_NO = Y.ORDRS_NO) /* 수주마스터 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 A ON Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD = A.CLNT_CD /* 거래처마스터 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM01M01 E ON(X.PRDT_CD=E.PRDT_CD) ) C ON(B.CO_CD=C.CO_CD AND B.SALES_CD=C.SALES_CD) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.CO_CD DESC, A.IN_NO DESC, A.CREAT_DTTM DESC, A.UDT_DTTM DESC ) X ) WHERE 1=1 AND RN BETWEEN ${firstIndex} AND ${lastIndex}

/* No. 내림차순 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , A.IN_NO /* 입고번호 */ , A.IO_DIV AS IO_DIV_CD /* 수불구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.IO_DIV) AS IO_DIV_NM /* 아이템 구분명 */ , A.REQ_NO /* 요인별 요청번호 */ , A.SALES_CD , A.PCHS_CLNT_CD /* 구매처cd */ , ( SELECT D.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 D WHERE A.PCHS_CLNT_CD=D.CLNT_CD ) AS PCHS_CLNT_NM /* 구매처명 */ , C.ORDRS_CLNT_CD /* 고객사 */ , C.ORDRS_CLNT_NM /* 고객사명 */ , C.CLNT_PJT /* 고객사 PJT */ , C.PRDT_CD /* 제품구분 */ , C.PRDT_NM /* 제품구분명 */ , C.ITEM_DIV /* 아이템 구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(C.ITEM_DIV) AS ITEM_DIV_NM /* 아이템 구분명 */ , TO_CHAR(A.IN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DT /* 압고일자 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV10 /* 발주구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV10) AS ORDRG_DIV10_NM /* 발주구분명 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV20 /* 용도구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV20) AS ORDRG_DIV20_NM /* 용도구분명 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV30 /* 특성구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV30) AS ORDRG_DIV30_NM /* 특성구분명 */ , A.CURR_CD /* 통화단위 */ , A.EXRATE , IN_AMT /* 입고금액 */ , TO_CHAR(A.IN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DT /* 입고일자 */ , A.ETC_FIELD1 , A.ETC_FIELD2 , A.ETC_FIELD3 , A.CREAT_ID , A.CREAT_PGM , A.CREAT_DTTM FROM TB_SM03M01 A INNER JOIN TB_SM02M01 B ON(A.CO_CD=B.CO_CD AND A.SALES_CD=B.SALES_CD AND A.REQ_NO=B.REQ_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ , Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD /* 고객사 */ , A.CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM /* 고객사명 */ , X.SALES_CD , Y.CLNT_PJT /* 고객사PJT */ , X.PRDT_CD /* 제품구분 */ , E.PRDT_NM /* 제품구분명 */ , X.ITEM_DIV /* 아이템 구분 */ , X.EQP_NM /* 설비명 */ FROM TB_CR02D02 X /* 수주상세 */ INNER JOIN TB_CR02M01 Y ON(X.CO_CD = Y.CO_CD AND X.ORDRS_NO = Y.ORDRS_NO) /* 수주마스터 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 A ON Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD = A.CLNT_CD /* 거래처마스터 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM01M01 E ON(X.PRDT_CD=E.PRDT_CD) ) C ON(B.CO_CD=C.CO_CD AND B.SALES_CD=C.SALES_CD) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.CO_CD DESC, A.IN_NO DESC, A.CREAT_DTTM DESC, A.UDT_DTTM DESC ) X ) WHERE 1=1 /* 엑셀은 전체 조회 */
